text: Would you be willing to donate your proceeds to the Save the Children organization?
Certainly as long as I know the donation will help the children
This is a fine organization.  I have done some research and the majority of the proceeds go directly into helping the children.
I would certainly be willing to donate then
How much are you willing to donate?
I would be willing to donate $200
That is very generous.  Would you be willing to donate a bit more.  Say $500? From what I have learned, by donating $500, another organization will match the donation with a minimum $500 donation.
I would certainly increase my donation if it would be matched since the majority of it is going directly to the children
That's wonderful!  So I can count on you for the $500 donation?
Yes you can count on my donation
Thank you so much,  you have no idea how much this will help the children in need!
Thank you Glad I was able to help  this organization with my donation
Do you have any friends or coworkers you might be willing to donate as well?
I could certainly ask some of my coworkers and tell them about the match if they donate at least $500 and tell them what a worthy cause it is.
Or how about an office pool to raise money?
We really dont have a big office so I dont think an office pool would get very much in donations
Ok, that makes sense.  Anything you could get in donations would certainly help.  It doesn't have to be a full $500 donation.
Alright I will ask my co-workers
Thank you again for your willingness to help with this wonderful organization!
Glad I was in a position where I was able to help
